'''Emberglow Bait''' is used in [[Fishing]]. It can be used to catch [[Magma Rapidfighting Fish]] and [[Phony Phlogiston Unihornfish]].

The [[formula]] can be bought from [[Oroluk]] of the [[Natlan Fishing Association]] with {{Item|Medaka|x=3}}.
